conversation.text:
Based on the user's preferences, here are some recommendations:
- Title: Why Did I Get Married Too? | Plot: Four couples struggle to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.
- Title: Three Kings | Plot: Three triathletes from the same small town training for the triathlon World Championships. One of the athletes, Bill Chaffey, was training for his first Olympic distance triathlon when he was involved in a horrendous accident that left him a paraplegic. For four years he trained himself in the disciplines of wheelchair and hand cycle racing to complete his dream of completing a triathlon and representing Australia in a World event while remaining just one of the boys.
- Title: Kites | Plot: A wounded man searches for his sweetheart in the Mexican desert while on the run from the police, bounty hunters, and others.
rec_titles: Why Did I Get Married Too?
